name: The EATO Diet
description:
Made during the 2rd bianually-ish gamejam, with the 1HP theme.

This is a Tower Defense game, where you can walk around and fight amongst your towers. Be wary that you do not get hit by them though, as these bullets do not know left from right.

Source code is available here: https://github.com/ruudschouten/1HPJam

The credits for audio can able to found on this repo here; https://github.com/ruudschouten/1HPJam/blob/master/audio.md
